alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 10:40AM EST until January 15 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting 30 to 40 mph at times. * WHERE...Eastern Addison County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with areas of blowing snow and significantly reduced visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause isolated power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chill values are expected to range from the single digits above zero to as low as minus 10 tonight, which increases the risk of cold exposure or hypothermia for travelers who get disoriented or stranded.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
